title: Council Decision of 20 July 1998 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 20 July 1998 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives (98/C 247/02)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
The following is hereby appointed a member of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives for the period until 22 October 1998:
C. >TABLE>
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 July 1998
For the Council
The President
W. MOLTERER
(1) OJ L 33, 11.2.1980, p. 13.
(2) OJ C 292, 7.11.1995, p. 2.
